item.title: Large pothole, 29th January
item.description:
On side of road heading out of Cheltenham. Difficult to avoid in dark, with big thump as car went over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole, 29th January
item.description:
Opposite 85 Nine Elms road. Pot hole in the middle of the road as you head towards Tommie Richs school. Been there for a few days and getting bigger. This route is very busy with school traffic so only a matter of time before it damages a car or cyclist
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Elmbridge, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many potholes causing very broken and uneven road surface at junction with Ashtree Mews, 29th January

item.title: 3 large potholes getting larger daily due to increased school traffic ., 29th January
item.description:
Corner of The Hamblins outside gate to No1 and adjacent area. Corner area. Getting more dangerous daily to pedestrians and children at Coberley school as well as cyclists and car drivers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Absolute disgrace. Huge section of road completely worn away, 29th January
item.description:
What3Words: ///neat.solve.label Gloucestershire highways should be ashamed. The state of this road. One huge pothole with several small ones around it. This whole section of road around the garage needs a full resurface.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous repair failing AGAIN, 29th January
item.description:
What3Words: ///carbon.combining.grapes This pothole has been repaired multiple times and the repairs keep failing. The concrete of the bridge underneath is exposed yet again. This can't be good for the life of the bridge, let alone the cars using the road. Maybe highways should do a propper repair this time?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
